Made in the USA. Dry clean. Lining: 90% rayon/10% lycra spandex. Shell: 89% polyamide/8% elastane/3% viscose. Fabric: Stretch lace. A stretch-lace mini dress conforms to every curve, giving an elegant fabric a boost of sex appeal. Scalloped edges and a boat neckline keep the look refined. Sheer yoke and elbow-length sleeves. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer As loungewear becomes ubiquitous and the line between boudoir and street wear blurs, the stylish woman knows it is possible to be comfortable and sexy at the same time. Carisa Brambles, LA-based founder of the casual label Young Fabulous & Broke takes this comfy-chic approach to a new level with her contemporary designs that re-imagine everything from cover-ups to cashmere. Lace accents, equestrian influences, and a flair for femininity all flourish in the provocative Nightcap Clothing collection.
